channel.title: Recent downtime
channel.description: Sorry about the downtime today, the hard drive on MITB's server decided to an hero and go read only. We should be good now!

item.title: Recent downtime
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, we are officially good now. We are on a nice shiny new file system, and the raid array is synced. Downtime in the future from hard drive failures should be < 20 minutes, just the time to shut it down and physically swap drives.

Read full topic

item.title: Recent downtime
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

We shouldn’t be good quite yet. I’ve got most everything copied to a new drive, after I finish the server will go down once again to replace the bad drive, THEN we should be good.

Read full topic
